headline: Heat Not Burn Tobacco Products Market Forecasts 2025-2030 Featuring Philip Morris, JT International, British American Tobacco, Mysmok Electronic Technology, Imperial Brands, and Japan Tobacco
summary: The heat-not-burn tobacco products market is forecasted to grow from USD 17.027 billion in 2025 to USD 87.961 billion by 2030, at a 38.88% CAGR. Growth is driven by rising consumer demand, regulatory approvals, and tech advancements. However, competition from e-cigarettes and strict regulations pose challenges.
